meanings.definition: Causing an unpleasant feeling of fear or unease.
meanings.sent1: The dark, creepy forest made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house had a creepy atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The creepy noise turned out to be just a squeaky door.
meanings.sent4: Her creepy smile sent chills down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The creepy shadows danced on the wall, creating a spooky scene.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a strange or eerie feeling.
meanings.sent1: The creepy old doll gave me a weird feeling.
meanings.sent2: The foggy night had a creepy vibe to it.
meanings.sent3: His creepy dance moves made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned amusement park had a creepy, forgotten aura.
meanings.sent5: The creepy music added an eerie touch to the movie.

meanings.definition: Causing a sensation of fear or unease.
meanings.sent1: The creepy movie kept me on the edge of my seat.
meanings.sent2: The creepy stories around the campfire made us all nervous.
meanings.sent3: The creepy prank made everyone jump in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The creepy fog obscured everything in a mysterious haze.
meanings.sent5: The creepy painting seemed to follow me with its eyes.
